00008 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00009     FUNCTION: wn_error()
00010      PURPOSE: Display an message in a window with 1 exit button
00011       SYNTAX: void wn_error(char *format, ...);
00012  DESCRIPTION: uses wn_dialog in the middle of the screen.
00013      RETURNS: nothing
00014      HISTORY: 910717 V0.1 - Initial version
00015 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00016 void wn_error(char *format, ...)
00017 {
00018   va_list arguments;
00019   static MENU menu[] = {{"OK"}};
00020   int _tmp_att;
00021   char s[132];
00022 
00023   wn_log("BEGIN WN_ERROR()\n");
00024   wn_log_indent(+3);
00025 
00026   menu[0].flags |= EXIT;
00027 
00028   va_start(arguments,format);
00029   vsprintf(s,format,arguments);
00030   va_end(arguments);
00031 
00032   _tmp_att = _dialog_att;
00033   wn_dialog(13,40,1,menu,1,s);
00034   _dialog_att = _tmp_att;
00035 
00036   wn_log_indent(-3);
00037   wn_log("END WN_ERROR\n");
00038 }
